Matched Articles.Speaker: instagram-posts
Matched Articles.Main Claim: The shooter who attempted to assassinate Donald Trump was “Maxwell Yearick.”
Matched Articles.Justification: The FBI identified the shooter at the July 13 Donald Trump rally in Butler, Pennsylvania, as Thomas Matthew Crooks, a 20-year-old from Bethel Park, Pennsylvania. The gun used in the assassination attempt was traced to Crooks’ father. The FBI believes Crooks acted alone.
Sources: FBI Statement on Incident in Butler

source_claims.claim: The shooter who attempted to assassinate Donald Trump was “Maxwell Yearick.”

Matched Articles.Speaker: instagram-posts
Matched Articles.Main Claim: Footage shows explosion on Baltimore bridge.
Matched Articles.Justification: The explosion shown in this footage is from 2022 and happened on Kerch Bridge, which connects Crimea and Russia. Learn more about PolitiFact’sfact-checking process and rating system.

source_claims.claim: Footage shows explosion on Baltimore bridge.

Matched Articles.Speaker: instagram-posts
Matched Articles.Main Claim: The 2020 election was the only time in American history that an election took more than 24 hours to count.
Matched Articles.Justification: There has never been a presidential election in which every vote has been counted within 24 hours. Official results take days to weeks to certify, experts said. Media organizations can call races before every vote is counted. There are several examples of presidential and state elections that took longer than the 2020 presidential election to call. Learn more about PolitiFact’sfact-checking process and rating system.

source_claims.claim: The 2020 election was the only time in American history that an election took more than 24 hours to count.

Matched Articles.Speaker: instagram-posts
Matched Articles.Main Claim: "Acapulco destroyed by yet another directed weather attack!”
Matched Articles.Justification: Hurricane Otis stunned weather forecasters with winds that rapidly intensified in the 24 hours before it struck Acapulco, a Mexican resort city. Such rapid intensification is becoming more common because of warming oceans, a recent study showed. There are weather modification programs in use, but none that could intensify a hurricane or direct it on a path, experts said.
Sources: The National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration

source_claims.claim: "Acapulco destroyed by yet another directed weather attack!”

Matched Articles.Speaker: instagram-posts
Matched Articles.Main Claim: The U.S. chicken and egg shortage is linked to Bill Gates.
Matched Articles.Justification: The Agriculture Department has said the avian flu outbreak in the U.S. is the main contributor to low inventory and high prices. Other factors are pandemic-related supply chain issues and holiday demand. Over the last decade, Bill Gates has invested in multiple companies, including Beyond Meat and Impossible Foods, that develop plant-based meat alternatives. He has also been a proponent of chicken farming. Since 2020, Gates has held the title of the nation’s largest private farmland owner, per The Land Report. As of 2022, he owned 248,000 acres of farmland across more than a dozen states, but this accounts for less than 1% of the total farmland in the U.S.
Sources: Various searches on Google and Nexis

source_claims.claim: The U.S. chicken and egg shortage is linked to Bill Gates.

Matched Articles.Speaker: instagram-posts
Matched Articles.Main Claim: “It’s not that there is no evidence the election was stolen, but that no court had the guts to HEAR the evidence. They dismissed the cases, NOT the evidence.”
Matched Articles.Justification: Election security officials have said the 2020 presidential election was secure and post-election audits in various states found no evidence of widespread fraud. Post-election lawsuits were thrown out for jurisdictional or procedural reasons, but several judges also said the Trump campaign’s allegations of election fraud lacked sufficient proof. A group of prominent conservatives examined 64 cases brought by Trump and his allies and found that 30 included a hearing on the case’s merits. Trump and his allies won only one case, and it involved too few votes to impact the results, the group found.

source_claims.claim: “It’s not that there is no evidence the election was stolen, but that no court had the guts to HEAR the evidence. They dismissed the cases, NOT the evidence.”

Matched Articles.Speaker: instagram-posts
Matched Articles.Main Claim: Video shows “Italians take down an EU flag and replace it with an Italian flag” after the 2022 national election.
Matched Articles.Justification: The video is from 2013 and features neo-fascists in Italy tearing down the European Union flag. It is unrelated to the 2022 Italian election.

source_claims.claim: Video shows “Italians take down an EU flag and replace it with an Italian flag” after the 2022 national election.
